functional_jobs.job_statement: When navigating the website, I want to receive guidance on how to use it, so I can have a successful and efficient experience.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Orientation sessions and personal walkthroughs by experienced users.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Not all new users attend orientation or have access to experienced users for help.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: New users can navigate the website independently and find what they need without frustration.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Increased user satisfaction and reduced support requests from new users.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I am using the website, I want to feel confident and competent, so I can enjoy my experience without frustration.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website with the help of an experienced user or through trial and error.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Feeling overwhelmed or confused, especially for those with limited computer skills.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Confidence in using the website and feeling capable of navigating it independently.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Users report feeling more confident and less stressed when using the site.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I engage with the website, I want to be perceived as knowledgeable and tech-savvy, so I can fit in with others who use it easily.
social_jobs.current_solution: Relying on personal assistance from experienced users to understand the website.
social_jobs.pain_points: Struggling to use the website can lead to feelings of inadequacy compared to peers.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Being able to navigate the website successfully and share that knowledge with others.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Increased peer recognition and positive feedback from others regarding my website navigation skills.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When exploring events on the website, I want to easily find relevant information, so I can make informed decisions about attending.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Searching through the website manually for event details.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty finding event dates, prices, and status of waiting lists.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Quick access to event details, including dates, prices, and availability.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Ability to find event information quickly and accurately without confusion.
